code: import emailjs from'emailjs-com';import{FAILED_SENDING_CONTACTS,START_SENDING_CONTACTS,SUCCESSFUL_SENDING_CONTACTS}from'../../consts/actionTypes';export var sendContacts=function sendContacts(_ref){var mainInfo=_ref.mainInfo;return function(dispatch){dispatch(startSendingContacts());emailjs.send('service_yirp2bd','template_tyhhmv6',mainInfo,'user_tBk4d6fTc4EteI70sttN6').then(function(){dispatch(successfulSendingContacts());},function(error){dispatch(failedSendingContacts(error));});};};/*     ACTIONS     */export var startSendingContacts=function startSendingContacts(){return{type:START_SENDING_CONTACTS};};export var successfulSendingContacts=function successfulSendingContacts(){return{type:SUCCESSFUL_SENDING_CONTACTS};};export var failedSendingContacts=function failedSendingContacts(payload){return{type:FAILED_SENDING_CONTACTS,payload:payload};};
